name: Assassin's Game
effect: Talent: Combat
Talent: Combat
"With every breath you expend, you are one step closer to death." - Lord Jorach Ravenholdt

name: Bloodsurge, Kel'Thuzad's Blade of Agony
effect: Once per turn: Put 2 damage on your hero > If your hero would deal magical (Arcane ([Arcane]), Fire ([Fire]), Frost ([Frost]), Holy ([Holy]), Nature ([Nature]), or Shadow ([Shadow]) damage this turn, it deals that much +2 instead.
"This world will burn."

name: Deathbringer's Will
effect: When your hero deals combat damage to an opposing hero, you may put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Spirit of Northrend token into play with Ferocity, Stealth, and "At end of turn, destroy this ally."
"My boy died at the Wrath Gate. I am here only to collect his body." - High Overlord Saurfang

name: Favor of Acherus
effect: Talent: Unholy
Talent: Unholy
"We are eternal. We are undyielding." - Highlord Darion Mograine

name: Fel Trade
effect: Talent: Demonology
Talent: Demonology

name: Grace of the Lightbringer
effect: Talent: Holy
Talent: Holy
"Long have I struggled to forgive the Prince for his terrible transgressions." - Uther the Lightbringer

name: Halion, Staff of Forgotten Love
effect: If an ally you control dealt damage to a hero this turn, you pay 1 less to play cards.
"I'm sorry, Arthas. I can't watch you do this." - Lady Jaina Proudmoore

name: Invincible
effect:
When you place a resource face up, target ally you control has Invincible this turn. (It can't leave play, be targeted, or be dealt damage.)
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
Loyal and great of heart in life, may you find peace in death.

name: Mental Focus
effect: Talent: Discipline
Talent: Discipline
"In the darkness that surrounds us all, the Light is needed more the ever." - Argent Confessor Paletress

name: Mithrios, Bronzebeard's Legacy
effect:
Dwarves you control have Protector.
At the end of each turn, put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Dwarf Warrior ally token into play.
"FOR THE ALLIANCE AND FOR KHAZ MODAN!"

name: Muradin Bronzebeard
effect: At the end of your turn, this ally deals 4 melee damage to each damaged opposing hero and ally.
"If only I'd been able to stop you that day, Arthas, how different things migha' been."

name: Nexus Link
effect: Talent: Arcane
Talent: Arcane

name: Nightmare Ender
effect: On your turn: Destroy this weapon > Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards.
"Ysera grants me the favor to lay these foul creatures to rest!" - Valithria Dreamwalker

name: Oathbringer, Charge of the Ranger-General
effect: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to target hero for each ability, ally, and equipment you control.
Etched in blood across the axe head is one word repeated ten times: SUFFER.

name: Path of Life
effect: Talent: Restoration
Talent: Restoration
"The cycle of life is inevitable." - Arch Druid Lilliandra

name: Phylactery of the Nameless Lich
effect: At the end of your turn, you may put an Unlimited ally from your hand into play if its cost is less that or equal to the cost of an Unlimited ally you control.
"Can you feel the cold hand of death upon your heart?" - Sindragosa

name: Pugius, Fist of Defiance
effect: When your hero is dealt damage for the first time each turn, you may add a +1 ATK counter to this weapon.
"In the end, you will all serve me." - The Lich King

name: Reinforced Steel
effect: Talent: Arms
Talent: Arms
"The time has come to bring retribution for the countless souls lost in Lordaeron's fall!" - King Varian Wrynn

name: Residue Rendezvous
effect:
Pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card for each damaged hero and ally you control.
"If you happen to come across live specimens, please return here immediately so that we can harvest them for study." - Alchemist Adrianna

name: Respite for a Tormented Soul
effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put target ally from a graveyard on top of its owner's deck.
"When you face Sindragosa, battle her until she is weakened, and then have your companions use these Crystals to coax the essence that is dormant within her." - Valithria Dreamwalker

name: Royal Scepter of Terenas II
effect: When a card enters your resource row, your hero may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.
Though it is broken and corrupt, you can still make out the royal seal of Lordaeron.

name: Securing the Ramparts
effect:
If you control an armor, item, and weapon: Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards.
"We are here to clear a safe landing for our vessels..." - Skybreaker Lieutenant

name: Serpent's Nest
effect: Talent: Survival
Talent: Survival
"A swarm of serpents is truly a sight to behold." - Hemet Nesingwary

name: Shadowmourne
effect: When this weapon enters play, remove target ally from the game. If you do, add X +1 ATK counters to this weapon, where X was the ATK of the removed ally.
"A newly forged weapon already steeped in this world's history, reborn into an unrivaled destiny."

name: Stormfury, Black Blade of the Betrayer
effect: At the start of your turn, if this weapon has two or fewer Demonic counters on it, add a Demonic counter. This weapon has +1 ATK and costs 1 less to strike with for each Demonic counter on it.
"I have known only ages of hate for you." - Illidan Stormrage

name: Terenas Menethil II
effect:
This ally enters play with four damage.
Mend 2
This ally has +8 ATK whil undamaged.
"No king rules forever, my son."

name: Tirion, the Ashbringer
effect:
Protector
Other [Holy] allies you control have +X/+X, where X is their cost.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to this ally by Scourge heroes and allies.
"The hour of justice has come!"

name: Varok Saurfang, High Overlord
effect:
Ferocity
When this ally would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of it for each damage on him.
"Rise up, sons and daughters of the Horde! LOK'TAR OGAR!"

name: Windrunner's Heartseeker
effect:
Long-Range
When this weapon enters play, put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Undead ally tokens into play.
This weapon has +1 ATK for each Undad you control.
"May Azeroth never fail to remember the terrible price we paid for our weakness... for our pride." - Dark Lady Sylvanas Windrunner

name: Windshear Totem
effect: Talent: Elemental
Talent: Elemental
